QueryResult.text: SELECT -- for discussions M.MESSAGE_ID OBJECT_INSTANCE_ID, P.OBJECT_ID OBJECT_ID, P.USER_ID USER_ID FROM CMN_SEC_ASSGND_OBJ_PERM_V0 P, NTD_MESSAGES M WHERE P.PERMISSION_VALUE = 1 AND P.OBJECT_ID = 401 AND M.ALL_PARENT_PARTICIPANTS = P.OBJECT_INSTANCE_ID UNION SELECT -- For action items and events P.PROJECT_ID OBJECT_INSTANCE_ID, 300 OBJECT_ID, UG.USER_ID USER_ID FROM CLB_PROJECT_GROUP_KEYS P, CMN_SEC_GROUP_FLAT_HIERS H, CMN_SEC_USER_GROUPS UG WHERE H.PARENT_GROUP_ID = P.PROJECT_MEMBERS_GROUP_ID AND UG.GROUP_ID = H.GROUP_ID
